item.title: US retail sales rose slightly in September, adding to months of big gains
item.description: Sales at U.S. retailers and restaurants rose slightly in September as resilient consumers moderated their spending after splurging over the summer

item.title: Best Buy ups sales outlook heading into holiday shopping season
